titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Daniel W. Lindsey
CWG13771

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Genl D. W. Lindsey, Dr.

row.cell: For services rendered and expenses incurred in the organization and administration of the Militia and other State forces during the month of May 1864.

body.p: The Quartermaster General is ordered to pay this acct. out of the Militia fund.

Thos E Bramlette
Govr
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort Kentucky, the 31st of May 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Two Hundred and twenty five Dollars, and -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

D. W. Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Genl D. W. Lindsey, Dr.

row.cell: For services rendered and expenses incurred in the organization and administration of the Militia and other State forces during the month of May 1864

body.p: The Quartermaster General is ordered to pay this acct. out of the Militia fund.

Thos E Bramlette
Govr
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort Ky, the 31st of May 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Two Hundred and twenty five Dollars, and -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

D. W. Lindsey
Insp Genl Ky.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
D. W. Lindsey
Dollars 225. 00/100
Paid May 31, 1864.
